page.title: 10Interviewing Mill Employee 1
page.content: We interviewed an employee who had worked in our local mill for nearly 50 years.{How old were you when you {started work at the mill? Could you {give us a year?} I was 14 years old and the year was 1936.{What were the {mills producing at the time?}All cotton.There were many types of cotton Indian cotton,American cotton,Egyptian cotton.{Were many local people {employed at the mills?}There was about 80% of the local people employed at the mills.{This year we are {celebrating victory in Europe-can you {remember life in the mills during {World War Two?}Well,just at the start of the war,Yes!because I was in the forces and it was very,very, hectic. You'd notice when you walked around all the glass all the windows had to be blocked out.No light had to show at all and it got very hot.
